title: Ep. 01 LeeAnn Kreischer - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT?  Hosted by Comedian and exhausted mother of two boys,  Christina P.  Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

This first episode is with a Super Mom and friend of Christina's, LeeAnn Kreischer. LeeAnn is a mom of 2 teenage girls and one 46 year-old man. Christina and LeeAnn talks about how their moms influenced the ways they parent, what ding dongs their husbands can be and get into all the grime with "Mom Fails," "I Almost Killed My Kid," "Cool Moms" and "#MomTrends."

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" please call into our voicemail (#) and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

WhereMyMomsAt@gmail.com (213) 375-5184
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
